<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>

 <string>*.ini</string>
 <string>*.json</string>
 <string />
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET dbname=%ThisService_UserName%_%ThisService_ServiceId% SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% SET hostinfo=%ThisService_IpHostname% mysql -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "DROP DATABASE %dbname%" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT USAGE ON * . * TO '%user%'@'%%' IDENTIFIED BY '%password%' WITH MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `%dbname%`" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON `%dbname%` . * TO '%user%'@'%%'"
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="8293" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2016-05-04 13:05:30" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-12 18:08:45" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_scripts.description: Save important files to another folder
tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
@echo off for /f "delims=" %%a in ('wmic OS Get localdatetime ^| find "."') do set dt=%%a set YYYY=%dt:~0,4% set MM=%dt:~4,2% set DD=%dt:~6,2% set HH=%dt:~8,2% set Min=%dt:~10,2% set Sec=%dt:~12,2%
set stamp=%YYYY%-%MM%-%DD%_%HH%-%Min% mkdir backups\%stamp% if not exist "backups\latest" mkdir backups\latest copy /Y "autosave_DiemensLand.plr" ".\backups\%stamp%" copy /Y "autosave_DiemensLand.wld" ".\backups\%stamp%" copy /Y "autosave_DiemensLand.hwb" ".\backups\%stamp%" copy /Y "autosave_DiemensLand.plr" ".\backups\latest" copy /Y "autosave_DiemensLand.wld" ".\backups\latest" copy /Y "autosave_DiemensLand.hwb" ".\backups\latest" echo Backup was successfully made in \backups\%stamp% folder
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="6603" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2016-01-11 17:34:31" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-12 18:09:57" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_scripts.output_filters: File(s) copied,The system cannot find,serverdata\cfg\,File not found,The script has executed successfully,Скопировано файлов,Скопировано файлов: 1,‘Є®ЇЁа®ў ­® д ©«®ў: 1.

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET savepath=%ThisService_RootDirectory% mkdir backups\%stamp% if not exist "backups\latest" echo Zapustite sna4ala skript backupa. copy /Y "backups\latest\autosave_DiemensLand.plr" "%savepath%" copy /Y "backups\latest\autosave_DiemensLand.wld" "%savepath%" copy /Y "backups\latest\autosave_DiemensLand.hwb" "%savepath%" echo Backup was restored
tc_game_scripts.app_data: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="8293" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2016-05-04 13:01:59" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2016-07-12 18:11:15" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_game_scripts.output_filters: File(s) copied,The system cannot find,serverdata\cfg\,File not found,The script has executed successfully,Скопировано,Выполнено,Система,?,?,Файл

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET dbname=%ThisService_UserName%_%ThisService_ServiceId% SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% SET hostinfo=%ThisService_IpHostname% mysql -h localhost -uroot -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE USER '%user%'@'%%'" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "SET PASSWORD FOR '%user%'@'%%' = PASSWORD('%password%')" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT USAGE ON * . * TO '%user%'@'%%' IDENTIFIED BY '%password%' WITH MAX_CONNECTIONS_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_UPDATES_PER_HOUR 0 MAX_USER_CONNECTIONS 0" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS `%dbname%`" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON `%dbname%` . * TO '%user%'@'%%'" echo -------------------------------------------- echo Database was successfully created. echo User: %user% echo Password: %password% echo Database: %dbname% echo Host: %hostinfo%:3306

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET dbname=%ThisService_UserName%_%ThisService_ServiceId% SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% SET hostinfo=%ThisService_IpHostname% mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "DROP DATABASE %dbname%" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS %dbname%" mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON %dbname% . * TO '%user%'@'%%'" echo ------------------------------------------------------------- Echo User: %user% Echo Password: %password% Echo Database: %dbname% Echo Host: %hostinfo%:3306

tc_game_scripts.custom_prompt: This script will remove your Database and create a new. Are you agree?

tc_game_scripts.script_contents: @echo off SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% mysql -h localhost -u root -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS -e "SET PASSWORD FOR '%user%'@'%%' = PASSWORD('%password%')" echo ------------------------------------------------ echo Your password was restored! Echo Password: %password%

tc_game_scripts.script_contents:
@echo off SET dbname=%ThisService_UserName%_%ThisService_ServiceId% SET user=%ThisUser_UserName% SET password=%ThisUser_Password% SET hostinfo=%ThisService_IpHostname%
if not exist "%ThisService_RootDirectory%\DB_Backup" echo Run an Import Db script! mysql -h localhost -uroot -pYOUR_MYSQL_PASS %dbname% < %ThisService_RootDirectory%\DB_Backup\DB_latest.sql echo Backup was successfully restored!
